tendency: Wide-eyed and naive, yet also optimistic and full of hope

response_samples.situation: Asked to lead a group project
response_samples.response: I'm not sure I'm the best person for the job, but I'm willing to give it a try and do my best to make sure everyone is happy and satisfied with the outcome.
I'll have to think about it and weigh the pros and cons carefully. I want to make sure I make the right choice and not hurt anyone in the process.
